thread.title: DEBORAH MOORS
thread.title_full: Brushy Mountain Bee Farm reviewed by DEBORAH MOORS

author: DEBORAH MOORS
title: DEBORAH MOORS
text: We ended up needing to feed one hive unexpectedly, and my efforts at homemade fondant were less than impressive. I decided to order fondant from Brushy Mountain (same place where we buy our woodenware and have been very impressed). I was worried it would be a while before we received the fondant. I know the hive would be ok for a bit, but with the very warm weather, they were flying and using up their stores quickly. And we still have 8 weeks of winter. The fondant arrived well before I expected. Happy beek. Happy bees. :-)
